mapper.insert: insert into ACC_MTD_PLAN (BILL_NO, PS_PERD_NO, PS_DUE_DT, PS_PRCP_AMT, PS_NORM_INT_AMT, PS_INSTM_AMT, PS_INT_RATE, FX_TYP, PS_REAL_DT, PS_REAL_PRCP_AMT, PS_REAL_INT_AMT, REPAY_FLAG, PS_OD_INT_AMT, PS_COMM_OD_INT, SETL_OD_INC_TAKEN, SETL_COMM_OD_INT, OVERDUE_DATE, INPUT_TIME, CLAIM_INPUT_DATE, CLAIMED_AMOUNT, UPDATE_WAY, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_ID, INPUT_BR_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_BR_ID, STRIKE_SUC_DATE, STRIKE_OPER, ABSTRACT, PAID_CAPITAL, PAID_INT_AMT, PAID_INC_TAKEN, PAID_COMM_OD_INT, PAID_ESTIM_INC_TAKEN, CALCU_LATEFEE_DATE, LATE_FEE, REMARK, OVER_DAYS, OVER_AMOUNT) values (#{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psInstmAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psIntRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fxTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psRealDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psRealPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psRealIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{repayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{psOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{psCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{setlOdIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{setlCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimInputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{claimedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strikeSucDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{strikeOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abstract_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paidEstimIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{calcuLatefeeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update ACC_MTD_PLAN
PS_DUE_DT = #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PS_PRCP_AMT = #{psPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PS_NORM_INT_AMT = #{psNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PS_INSTM_AMT = #{psInstmAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PS_INT_RATE = #{psIntRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FX_TYP = #{fxTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PS_REAL_DT = #{psRealDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PS_REAL_PRCP_AMT = #{psRealPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PS_REAL_INT_AMT = #{psRealIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REPAY_FLAG = #{repayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
PS_OD_INT_AMT = #{psOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PS_COMM_OD_INT = #{psCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETL_OD_INC_TAKEN = #{setlOdIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SETL_COMM_OD_INT = #{setlCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVERDUE_DATE = #{overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIM_INPUT_DATE = #{claimInputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLAIMED_AMOUNT = #{claimedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATE_WAY = #{updateWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_DATE = #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_ID = #{inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INPUT_BR_ID = #{inputBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_BR_ID = #{updateBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STRIKE_SUC_DATE = #{strikeSucDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STRIKE_OPER = #{strikeOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABSTRACT = #{abstract_,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAID_CAPITAL = #{paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_INT_AMT = #{paidIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_INC_TAKEN = #{paidIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_COMM_OD_INT = #{paidCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAID_ESTIM_INC_TAKEN = #{paidEstimIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CALCU_LATEFEE_DATE = #{calcuLatefeeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATE_FEE = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OVER_DAYS = #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OVER_AMOUNT = #{overAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PS_PERD_NO = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ACC_MTD_PLAN set PS_DUE_DT = #{psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PS_PRCP_AMT = #{psPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PS_NORM_INT_AMT = #{psNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PS_INSTM_AMT = #{psInstmAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PS_INT_RATE = #{psIntRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FX_TYP = #{fxTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PS_REAL_DT = #{psRealDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PS_REAL_PRCP_AMT = #{psRealPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PS_REAL_INT_AMT = #{psRealIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REPAY_FLAG = #{repayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, PS_OD_INT_AMT = #{psOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PS_COMM_OD_INT = #{psCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETL_OD_INC_TAKEN = #{setlOdIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SETL_COMM_OD_INT = #{setlCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERDUE_DATE = #{overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_TIME = #{inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLAIM_INPUT_DATE = #{claimInputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLAIMED_AMOUNT = #{claimedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATE_WAY = #{updateWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_DATE = #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_ID = #{inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_BR_ID = #{inputBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BR_ID = #{updateBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRIKE_SUC_DATE = #{strikeSucDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STRIKE_OPER = #{strikeOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABSTRACT = #{abstract_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAID_CAPITAL = #{paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_INT_AMT = #{paidIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_INC_TAKEN = #{paidIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_COMM_OD_INT = #{paidCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAID_ESTIM_INC_TAKEN = #{paidEstimIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CALCU_LATEFEE_DATE = #{calcuLatefeeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATE_FEE = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OVER_DAYS = #{overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVER_AMOUNT = #{overAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where BILL_NO = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PS_PERD_NO = #{psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ACC_MTD_PLAN acc set (ps_real_dt, ps_od_int_amt, ps_comm_od_int, ps_real_prcp_amt, ps_real_int_amt, ps_instm_amt, setl_od_inc_taken, setl_comm_od_int) = (select max(ps_real_dt), max(ps_od_int_amt), max(ps_comm_od_int), sum(ps_real_prcp_amt), sum(ps_real_int_amt), acc.ps_norm_int_amt + acc.ps_prcp_amt, sum(setl_od_inc_taken), sum(setl_comm_od_int) from acc_mtd_ps_note aa where acc.bill_no = aa.bill_no and acc.ps_perd_no = aa.ps_perd_no) where exists (select 1 from acc_mtd_ps_note amp where acc.bill_no = amp.bill_no and acc.ps_perd_no = amp.ps_perd_no) and acc.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and acc.ps_perd_no=#{psPerdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update acc_mtd_plan accp set accp.repay_flag = (select case when (acc.ps_real_prcp_amt + acc.ps_real_int_amt) >= (acc.ps_prcp_amt + acc.ps_norm_int_amt) then case when hasClaimRepay(bill_no, ps_perd_no) = 'yes' then '21' when acc.ps_real_dt <= nvl(acc.ps_due_dt, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) then '10' when acc.ps_real_dt > nvl(acc.ps_due_dt, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) then '21' end else case when ps_real_dt is null and nvl(acc.ps_due_dt, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then '00' when ps_real_dt is not null and nvl(acc.ps_due_dt, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then '10' when nvl(acc.ps_due_dt, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') then '20' end end as repay_flag from acc_mtd_plan acc where acc.bill_no = accp.bill_no and acc.ps_perd_no = accp.ps_perd_no) where accp.bill_no = #{billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and accp.ps_perd_no=#{psPerdNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into ACC_MTD_PLAN (BILL_NO, PS_PERD_NO, PS_DUE_DT, PS_PRCP_AMT, PS_NORM_INT_AMT, PS_INSTM_AMT, PS_INT_RATE, FX_TYP, PS_REAL_DT, PS_REAL_PRCP_AMT, PS_REAL_INT_AMT, REPAY_FLAG, PS_OD_INT_AMT, PS_COMM_OD_INT, SETL_OD_INC_TAKEN, SETL_COMM_OD_INT, OVERDUE_DATE, INPUT_TIME, CLAIM_INPUT_DATE, CLAIMED_AMOUNT, UPDATE_WAY, INPUT_DATE, INPUT_ID, INPUT_BR_ID, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_ID, UPDATE_BR_ID, STRIKE_SUC_DATE, STRIKE_OPER, ABSTRACT, PAID_CAPITAL, PAID_INT_AMT, PAID_INC_TAKEN, PAID_COMM_OD_INT, PAID_ESTIM_INC_TAKEN, CALCU_LATEFEE_DATE, LATE_FEE, REMARK, OVER_DAYS, OVER_AMOUNT)
SELECT #{a.billNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.psPerdNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psDueDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.psPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psNormIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psInstmAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psIntRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.fxTyp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.psRealDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.psRealPrcpAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psRealIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.repayFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{a.psOdIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.psCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.setlOdIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.setlCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.overdueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.inputTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.claimInputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.claimedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.updateWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.inputId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.inputBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.updateBrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.strikeSucDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.strikeOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.abstract_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.paidCapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.paidIntAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.paidIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.paidCommOdInt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.paidEstimIncTaken,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.calcuLatefeeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a.overDays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{a.overAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} FROM DUAL
